itunes:title: Episode 19: Talking Architecture & Design speaks with Kathlyn Loseby & former NSW government architect Peter Poulet
title: Episode 19: Talking Architecture & Design speaks with Kathlyn Loseby & former NSW government architect Peter Poulet
description: Australian Institute of Architects NSW Chapter president Kathlyn Loseby joins former NSW government architect Peter Poulet to speak with Talking Architecture & Design about design, heritage, technology and the gender imbalance in the built environment.
content:encoded: Australian Institute of Architects NSW Chapter president Kathlyn Loseby joins former NSW government architect Peter Poulet to speak with Talking Architecture & Design about design, heritage, technology and the gender imbalance in the built environment.
